record.field:
PCB (Printed Circuit Board), the Chinese name for printed circuit boards, also known as printed circuit boards, is an important electronic component, a support for electronic components, and a carrier for electrical connection of electronic components. Because it is made by electronic printing, it is called a "printing" circuit board.

After the electronic equipment adopts the printed board, due to the consistency of the same printed board, the manual wiring is avoided, and the electronic components can be automatically inserted or mounted, automatically soldered, and automatically detected to ensure the quality of the electronic equipment. ,                          Increased labor productivity, reduced costs, and ease of maintenance.

PCBA is the abbreviation of Printed Circuit Board +Assembly in English, which means that the PCB blank board passes through the SMT upper part, and then passes through the whole process of DIP plug-in, referred to as PCBA.                         This is a commonly used method in the country, and the standard way of writing in Europe and America is PCB'A, plus "'", which is called the official idiom.

Printed circuit boards, also known as printed circuit boards, printed circuit boards, often use the English abbreviation PCB (Printed circuit board), is an important electronic component, is the support of electronic components, It is the provider of the circuit connection of electronic components. Because it is made using electronic printing technology, it is called a "printing" circuit board.

Prior to the advent of printed circuit boards, the interconnection between electronic components relied on wires to form a complete line.

SMT is a surface mount technology (short for Surface Mount Technology) called surface mount or surface mount technology. It is currently the most popular technology and process in the electronics assembly industry.

It is a surface or other substrate surface on which a leadless or short lead surface mount component (SMC/SMD, Chinese called a chip component) is mounted on a printed circuit board (PCB). In the above, the circuit assembly technology is assembled by soldering or dip soldering.

Since the beginning of the 21st century, China's electronic information products manufacturing industry has grown at a rate of more than 20% per year, and its scale has ranked second in the world for three consecutive years since 2004. Driven by the rapid development of China's electronic information industry, China's surface mount technology (SMT) and production lines have also developed rapidly. The key equipment for surface mount production lines, the automatic placement machine, has been among the best in the world.
Why do you have to deal with the special surface of the PCB?

SMT is a surface mount technology (short for Surface Mount Technology) called surface mount or surface mount technology. It is currently the most popular technology and process in the electronics assembly industry.

It is a surface or other substrate surface on which a leadless or short lead surface mount component (SMC/SMD, Chinese called a chip component) is mounted on a printed circuit board (PCB). In the above, the circuit assembly technology is assembled by soldering or dip soldering.

Since the beginning of the 21st century, China's electronic information products manufacturing industry has grown at a rate of more than 20% per year, and its scale has ranked second in the world for three consecutive years since 2004. Driven by the rapid development of China's electronic information industry, China's surface mount technology (SMT) and production lines have also developed rapidly. The key equipment for surface mount production lines, the automatic placement machine, has been among the best in the world.
